unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Are You REALLY Knowing Your Followers, Yaar?**
normalised: **Social Media and Influencer Marketing: Are You REALLY Knowing Your Followers, Yaar?**

unnormalised: Hey Insta fam! Tired of just seeing big follower numbers? Turns out, thatâ€™s *so* last year. Everyone's talking about follower analytics, and if you're not on board, you're missing out on some serious *masala*.
normalised: Hey Insta fam! Tired of just seeing big follower numbers? Turns out, that is *so* last year. Everyone is talking about follower analytics, and if you are not on board, you are missing out on some serious *masala*.

unnormalised: Think of it like this: knowing how many people are following your dance videos is good, but knowing that 70% of them are young women in Delhi and Mumbai interested in Bollywood gossip? Now *that's* powerful. Companies like "Desi Digital" are offering analytics that dive deep into follower demographics, interests, and even optimal posting times (apparently, 7 PM on Tuesdays is the sweet spot for food bloggers!).
normalised: Think of it like this: knowing how many people are following your dance videos is good, but knowing that seventy percent of them are young women in Delhi and Mumbai interested in Bollywood gossip? Now *that is* powerful. Companies like "Desi Digital" are offering analytics that dive deep into follower demographics, interests, and even optimal posting times (apparently, seven P M on Tuesdays is the sweet spot for food bloggers!).

unnormalised: Analytics help you tailor your content, spot fake followers (bye-bye, bots!), and even connect with brands who are looking for *exactly* your audience. Imagine, landing a saree endorsement deal just because your analytics showed a strong interest in traditional Indian wear!
normalised: Analytics help you tailor your content, spot fake followers (bye-bye, bots!), and even connect with brands who are looking for *exactly* your audience. Imagine, landing a saree endorsement deal just because your analytics showed a strong interest in traditional Indian wear!

unnormalised: Even your friendly neighborhood Chai stall owner, Raju, is using analytics to figure out the best flavors for his target demographic near IIT Bombay. The revolution started on 15/08/1947, and is continuing now on the internet at 09:00 hrs! Don't be a *chindi* - invest some time in understanding your audience. Your engagement (and bank balance) will thank you on 26/01/2024.
normalised: Even your friendly neighborhood Chai stall owner, Raju, is using analytics to figure out the best flavors for his target demographic near I I T Bombay. The revolution started on fifteenth august nineteen forty seven, and is continuing now on the internet at nine hundred hours! Do not be a *chindi* - invest some time in understanding your audience. Your engagement (and bank balance) will thank you on twenty sixth january two thousand and twenty four.
